Docs.param: An that can be used to gain additional context information.
An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> through which editing services can be obtained.
Docs.summary: Edits the specified object value using the edit style provided by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Object> representing the new value. If the value of the object has not changed, the EditValue method returns the object that was passed to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This editor uses a service provider to obtain any necessary editing services.
